name: ListAssets
description:
Retrieve a list of all assets in Freshservice.

This tool is used to get a complete list of all assets available in the Freshservice platform. It can be called to fetch detailed inventory information, aiding in asset management tasks.

parameters.name: entries_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of asset entries to retrieve per page in a paginated list. Not applicable when a search or filter is used.

value_schema.description: The number of entries to retrieve in each page of a paginated list. This is not applicable when search or filter query is present.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve from the list of assets.

parameters.name: include_asset_type_fields
parameters.description: Specify asset type fields to include in the response.

value_schema.description: Query param to include asset type fields in response.

parameters.name: asset_filter_query
parameters.description: A URL-encoded query string to filter the asset list. Supports parameters like asset_type_id, department_id, location_id, and more.

value_schema.description:
The simple or compound query which needs to be applied as a filter to the list of asset. This string needs to be URL encoded.
Supported Query Parameters:
asset_type_id, department_id, location_id, asset_state, user_id, agent_id, name, asset_tag, created_at, updated_at.
Sample Query: https://account.freshservice.com/api/v2/assets?filter="asset_type_id:12034 AND asset_tag:'HSN2323' AND created_at:>'2018-08-10'"

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: A simple query to search for an asset. Supports 'name', 'asset_tag', and 'serial_number'. Example: "name:'dell monitor'".

value_schema.description:
The simple query which needs to be applied to search an asset from the list of assets.
Supported Query Parameters:
name, asset_tag, serial_number.
Sample Query: https://account.freshservice.com/api/v2/assets?search="name:'dell monitor'"

parameters.name: list_trashed_assets_only
parameters.description: Set to true to list only assets in the trash.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of entries to retrieve in each page of a paginated list. This is not applicable when search or filter query is present.

value_schema.description: The number of entries to retrieve in each page of a paginated list. This is not applicable when search or filter query is present.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Query param to include asset type fields in response.

value_schema.description: Query param to include asset type fields in response.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
The simple or compound query which needs to be applied as a filter to the list of asset. This string needs to be URL encoded.
Supported Query Parameters:
asset_type_id, department_id, location_id, asset_state, user_id, agent_id, name, asset_tag, created_at, updated_at.
Sample Query: https://account.freshservice.com/api/v2/assets?filter="asset_type_id:12034 AND asset_tag:'HSN2323' AND created_at:>'2018-08-10'"

value_schema.description:
The simple or compound query which needs to be applied as a filter to the list of asset. This string needs to be URL encoded.
Supported Query Parameters:
asset_type_id, department_id, location_id, asset_state, user_id, agent_id, name, asset_tag, created_at, updated_at.
Sample Query: https://account.freshservice.com/api/v2/assets?filter="asset_type_id:12034 AND asset_tag:'HSN2323' AND created_at:>'2018-08-10'"

parameters.name: search
parameters.description:
The simple query which needs to be applied to search an asset from the list of assets.
Supported Query Parameters:
name, asset_tag, serial_number.
Sample Query: https://account.freshservice.com/api/v2/assets?search="name:'dell monitor'"

value_schema.description:
The simple query which needs to be applied to search an asset from the list of assets.
Supported Query Parameters:
name, asset_tag, serial_number.
Sample Query: https://account.freshservice.com/api/v2/assets?search="name:'dell monitor'"
